A zombie staff is etched with the rotting visage of an undead humanoid grimacing in terror and dismay carved atop it. The staff's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Summon Undead]spells can be used only to animate undead that have flesh and an Intelligence modifier of â€“4 or lower.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list. If you cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Summon Undead], you can also cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Protect Companion] on the resulting minion as a free action.

  • Cantrip @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Protect Companion]
  • 1st @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Summon Undead], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Necromancer's Generosity]
  • 2nd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Summon Undead], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Final Sacrifice]

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.
